entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 22.
